mapper.insert: INSERT INTO budget ( budget_id, owner_user_id, target_month, amount_limit, category_id, memo, is_active, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{budgetId}, #{ownerUserId}, #{targetMonth}, #{amountLimit}, #{categoryId}, #{memo}, #{isActive}, COALESCE(#{createdAt}, NOW()), NOW() ) ON CONFLICT (budget_id) DO UPDATE SET owner_user_id = EXCLUDED.owner_user_id, target_month = EXCLUDED.target_month, amount_limit = EXCLUDED.amount_limit, category_id = EXCLUDED.category_id, memo = EXCLUDED.memo, is_active = EXCLUDED.is_active, updated_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT budget_id, owner_user_id, target_month, amount_limit, category_id, memo, is_active, created_at, updated_at FROM budget WHERE budget_id = #{budgetId} AND owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId} AND is_active = TRUE
